content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":252412,"originalJapaneseLine":"よく見ると魔物隊長","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking closely, it's the monster captain."},{"lineNumber":252413,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様、ここって・・もしかして、魔軍の野営地では・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance, this place... could it be the monster army's campsite?"},{"lineNumber":252414,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、やった・・夜戦だ、夜戦","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, we did it... a night battle, a night battle."},{"lineNumber":252415,"originalJapaneseLine":"ものども、かかれー","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone, attack!"},{"lineNumber":252416,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":252417,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物隊長が・・ぐはっ・・と倒れた","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster captain... *ugh* collapsed."},{"lineNumber":252418,"originalJapaneseLine":"くっ・・これじゃない、俺が倒したいのは魔物大将軍ツォトンだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... this isn't it. The one I want to defeat is the Great Monster General Tzoton."},{"lineNumber":252419,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしくは妥協しても魔物将軍だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Or if I settle, then at least the Monster General."},{"lineNumber":252420,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな雑魚隊長ではない、くそっ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Not some weak little captain like this, damn it..."},{"lineNumber":252421,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵が集まってきていますよ","translatedEnglishLine":"The enemy is gathering."},{"lineNumber":252422,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたない、もう戻るぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"It can't be helped, let's retreat now."},{"lineNumber":252423,"originalJapaneseLine":"首都ラグナロックアーク","translatedEnglishLine":"Capital Ragnalock Ark."},{"lineNumber":252424,"originalJapaneseLine":"特に成果も無くランスが戻って来ていた（過去形）","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance had returned without any particular success (past tense)."},{"lineNumber":252425,"originalJapaneseLine":"ボス狙いの奇襲もいつもうまくいくとは限らないか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"A surprise attack targeting the boss doesn't always work out..."},{"lineNumber":252426,"originalJapaneseLine":"うんよく魔物将軍クラス、また魔物大将軍と遭遇出来る確率なんて低いですからね","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, the chance of encountering a monster general class or even a great monster general is really low."},{"lineNumber":252427,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、俺様は英雄なのに・・・むだ足ふませやがって","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, even though I'm a hero... made me waste my steps."},{"lineNumber":252428,"originalJapaneseLine":"新しい情報が入る、中立を保っていたハニーキング率いる","translatedEnglishLine":"New information has arrived: the Honey King, who had remained neutral,"},{"lineNumber":252429,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー軍団が魔物側についた模様です、その数１０万ほどかと","translatedEnglishLine":"The Honey army has apparently sided with the monsters, numbering around 100,000."},{"lineNumber":252430,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは有り得ないとウルザが驚く・・いや、かれらの事だから・・考える","translatedEnglishLine":"Ulza was surprised and said that's impossible... but then thought 'well, it is them...'"},{"lineNumber":252431,"originalJapaneseLine":"（意味深でいいです　ウルザは分かっています、","translatedEnglishLine":"(This is good for a meaningful hint: Ulza understands,"},{"lineNumber":252432,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハニーの趣味と考えと魔物がしてきた事が相反する事を）","translatedEnglishLine":"that Honey’s tastes and what the monsters have done are contradictory.)"},{"lineNumber":252433,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物軍だけでも大変なのに、さらにハニーまで・・もうお手上げだ","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster army alone is tough enough, and now Honey too... I'm at my wit's end."},{"lineNumber":252434,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザ、ハニーに関しては私に任せて下さい、少しツテがありますので","translatedEnglishLine":"Ulza, leave Honey to me; I have some connections."},{"lineNumber":252435,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとかツォトンを倒す事が出来れば・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"If we can somehow defeat Tzoton..."},{"lineNumber":252436,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが任せろ、今日はうまくいかなかったが、明日は必ず倒してやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Leave it to me, Rance said; today didn’t go well, but tomorrow I’ll definitely take him down."},{"lineNumber":252437,"originalJapaneseLine":"その夜、ランスの部屋にウルザが現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"That night, Ulza appeared in Rance’s room."},{"lineNumber":252438,"originalJapaneseLine":"おっ夜這いかと喜ぶが、ウルザは大切な話","translatedEnglishLine":"He was happy, thinking it was a night raid, but Ulza had an important matter to discuss."},{"lineNumber":252439,"originalJapaneseLine":"作戦がある協力して欲しい","translatedEnglishLine":"I have a plan and want your cooperation."},{"lineNumber":252440,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーの事か、敵についたハニーどもだな、みな殺しにするか","translatedEnglishLine":"About Honey? Those Honeys who sided with the enemy, should we kill them all?"},{"lineNumber":252441,"originalJapaneseLine":"いえ、そちらは私の方でたぶんなんとか出来ます","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I can probably handle that side myself."},{"lineNumber":252442,"originalJapaneseLine":"それより、魔軍本体の事です","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, it’s about the main force of the monster army."},{"lineNumber":252443,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":252444,"originalJapaneseLine":"私が得た情報によると","translatedEnglishLine":"According to the information I have obtained,"},{"lineNumber":252445,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスを占領している魔軍は、占領地で人民のより分けをしている模様です","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster army occupying Zess appears to be sorting the people in the occupied areas."},{"lineNumber":252446,"originalJapaneseLine":"学者、医者、先生、魔法技術者、優秀な者を選抜し奥地へ移動している","translatedEnglishLine":"They select scholars, doctors, teachers, magic technicians, and other outstanding individuals and move them to the interior."},{"lineNumber":252447,"originalJapaneseLine":"さらに、試験をしてより優秀な者はツォトンの元に送られているとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Furthermore, those who pass tests with high marks are said to be sent to Tzoton."},{"lineNumber":252448,"originalJapaneseLine":"たぶん、魔物将軍等の中に入れる素材にされているのと思われる","translatedEnglishLine":"It is probably to be used as material for becoming monster generals and such."},{"lineNumber":252449,"originalJapaneseLine":"なるほど、２重選抜をしているのか","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, they are doing a two-stage selection."},{"lineNumber":252450,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺も総統として魔軍を撃退した後は世界中から美女をどう集めるか","translatedEnglishLine":"After I, as the Supreme Leader, repel the monster army, I was thinking about how to gather beautiful women from all over the world."},{"lineNumber":252451,"originalJapaneseLine":"大変だなぁと思っていたが、その方法はいいな","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought it would be difficult, but that method is good."},{"lineNumber":252452,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは・・ともかく、話を戻します","translatedEnglishLine":"That aside... let me get back to the matter at hand."},{"lineNumber":252453,"originalJapaneseLine":"私が捕まっている捕虜に紛れて魔軍が行っているその知能試験を受ける","translatedEnglishLine":"I will take the intelligence test the monster army conducts, disguised as a prisoner held captive."},{"lineNumber":252454,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分で言うのもなんだけど、たぶん優秀な者として選ばれると思うわ","translatedEnglishLine":"I hate to say it myself, but I think I’ll be chosen as one of the outstanding."},{"lineNumber":252455,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ここうぬぼれキャラに見られないようにうまく表現して）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Express this so she doesn't seem conceited.)"},{"lineNumber":252456,"originalJapaneseLine":"特に優秀な者は魔物大将軍ツォトンの元に送られるというから、","translatedEnglishLine":"They say especially outstanding individuals are sent to the Great Monster General Tzoton."},{"lineNumber":252457,"originalJapaneseLine":"私がこっそり、この魔法通信機を押す","translatedEnglishLine":"I will secretly press this magic communicator."},{"lineNumber":252458,"originalJapaneseLine":"これはＧＰＳ内蔵で現在地を発信するの、数字の羅列でしかないけど","translatedEnglishLine":"It has a built-in GPS and sends the current location, though it's just a string of numbers."},{"lineNumber":252459,"originalJapaneseLine":"千鶴子なら場所を見つけてくれるわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chizuruko will find the place."},{"lineNumber":252460,"originalJapaneseLine":"これで魔物大将軍ツォトンの居場所が分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"With this, we will know the location of the Great Monster General Tzoton."},{"lineNumber":252461,"originalJapaneseLine":"後はランス君は魔人討伐隊を率いて攻撃して欲しい","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, Rance-kun, I want you to lead the demon extermination squad and attack."},{"lineNumber":252462,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、ついでに私も救出して欲しいかなと","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, and I’d like you to rescue me as well, if possible."},{"lineNumber":252463,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな無茶は駄目だ、誰か他の奴に・・","translatedEnglishLine":"That's reckless, no, have someone else..."},{"lineNumber":252464,"originalJapaneseLine":"知能試験でトップを確実に取れるのって・・私くらいよ、","translatedEnglishLine":"The one who can surely top the intelligence test... is me."},{"lineNumber":252465,"originalJapaneseLine":"それにマジックにはこれ以上無理はさせられない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, I can't push Magic any further."},{"lineNumber":252466,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの子は守らないといけない子もいる、私は独り身だし","translatedEnglishLine":"That girl has someone she must protect, but I’m single."},{"lineNumber":252467,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここ、ランスとウルザのいい距離間が分かる感じで・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, you get a sense of the good distance between Rance and Ulza..."},{"lineNumber":252468,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラグナロックアーク、翌日","translatedEnglishLine":"Ragnalock Ark, the next day."},{"lineNumber":252469,"originalJapaneseLine":"千鶴子とマジックがウルザが出て行った事を知る","translatedEnglishLine":"Chizuruko and Magic learn that Ulza has left."},{"lineNumber":252470,"originalJapaneseLine":"無茶をすると怒るが、もうしかたないが無い","translatedEnglishLine":"They get angry if he does something reckless, but it can’t be helped now."},{"lineNumber":252471,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、ハニー達もいるし、いくら魔物大将軍の場所が分かっても","translatedEnglishLine":"But since Honey and her forces are also there, even if we know the Great Monster General's location..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく見ると魔物隊長
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking closely, it's the monster captain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、ここって・・もしかして、魔軍の野営地では・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, this place... could it be the monster army's campsite?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、やった・・夜戦だ、夜戦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, we did it... a night battle, a night battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ものども、かかれー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone, attack!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長が・・ぐはっ・・と倒れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain... *ugh* collapsed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ・・これじゃない、俺が倒したいのは魔物大将軍ツォトンだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... this isn't it. The one I want to defeat is the Great Monster General Tzoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしくは妥協しても魔物将軍だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or if I settle, then at least the Monster General.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな雑魚隊長ではない、くそっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not some weak little captain like this, damn it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵が集まってきていますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy is gathering.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたない、もう戻るぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can't be helped, let's retreat now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都ラグナロックアーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Capital Ragnalock Ark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に成果も無くランスが戻って来ていた（過去形）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance had returned without any particular success (past tense).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボス狙いの奇襲もいつもうまくいくとは限らないか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A surprise attack targeting the boss doesn't always work out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うんよく魔物将軍クラス、また魔物大将軍と遭遇出来る確率なんて低いですからね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, the chance of encountering a monster general class or even a great monster general is really low.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、俺様は英雄なのに・・・むだ足ふませやがって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, even though I'm a hero... made me waste my steps.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新しい情報が入る、中立を保っていたハニーキング率いる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: New information has arrived: the Honey King, who had remained neutral,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー軍団が魔物側についた模様です、その数１０万ほどかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honey army has apparently sided with the monsters, numbering around 100,000.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは有り得ないとウルザが驚く・・いや、かれらの事だから・・考える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ulza was surprised and said that's impossible... but then thought 'well, it is them...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （意味深でいいです　ウルザは分かっています、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (This is good for a meaningful hint: Ulza understands,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーの趣味と考えと魔物がしてきた事が相反する事を）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that Honey’s tastes and what the monsters have done are contradictory.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍だけでも大変なのに、さらにハニーまで・・もうお手上げだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster army alone is tough enough, and now Honey too... I'm at my wit's end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザ、ハニーに関しては私に任せて下さい、少しツテがありますので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ulza, leave Honey to me; I have some connections.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかツォトンを倒す事が出来れば・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we can somehow defeat Tzoton...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが任せろ、今日はうまくいかなかったが、明日は必ず倒してやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leave it to me, Rance said; today didn’t go well, but tomorrow I’ll definitely take him down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その夜、ランスの部屋にウルザが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That night, Ulza appeared in Rance’s room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっ夜這いかと喜ぶが、ウルザは大切な話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was happy, thinking it was a night raid, but Ulza had an important matter to discuss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦がある協力して欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have a plan and want your cooperation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーの事か、敵についたハニーどもだな、みな殺しにするか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About Honey? Those Honeys who sided with the enemy, should we kill them all?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、そちらは私の方でたぶんなんとか出来ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I can probably handle that side myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより、魔軍本体の事です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, it’s about the main force of the monster army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が得た情報によると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: According to the information I have obtained,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスを占領している魔軍は、占領地で人民のより分けをしている模様です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster army occupying Zess appears to be sorting the people in the occupied areas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学者、医者、先生、魔法技術者、優秀な者を選抜し奥地へ移動している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They select scholars, doctors, teachers, magic technicians, and other outstanding individuals and move them to the interior.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに、試験をしてより優秀な者はツォトンの元に送られているとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furthermore, those who pass tests with high marks are said to be sent to Tzoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん、魔物将軍等の中に入れる素材にされているのと思われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is probably to be used as material for becoming monster generals and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、２重選抜をしているのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, they are doing a two-stage selection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺も総統として魔軍を撃退した後は世界中から美女をどう集めるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After I, as the Supreme Leader, repel the monster army, I was thinking about how to gather beautiful women from all over the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大変だなぁと思っていたが、その方法はいいな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it would be difficult, but that method is good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは・・ともかく、話を戻します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That aside... let me get back to the matter at hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が捕まっている捕虜に紛れて魔軍が行っているその知能試験を受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will take the intelligence test the monster army conducts, disguised as a prisoner held captive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分で言うのもなんだけど、たぶん優秀な者として選ばれると思うわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hate to say it myself, but I think I’ll be chosen as one of the outstanding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ここうぬぼれキャラに見られないようにうまく表現して）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Express this so she doesn't seem conceited.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に優秀な者は魔物大将軍ツォトンの元に送られるというから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say especially outstanding individuals are sent to the Great Monster General Tzoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私がこっそり、この魔法通信機を押す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will secretly press this magic communicator.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはＧＰＳ内蔵で現在地を発信するの、数字の羅列でしかないけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It has a built-in GPS and sends the current location, though it's just a string of numbers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子なら場所を見つけてくれるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko will find the place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで魔物大将軍ツォトンの居場所が分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this, we will know the location of the Great Monster General Tzoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後はランス君は魔人討伐隊を率いて攻撃して欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, Rance-kun, I want you to lead the demon extermination squad and attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、ついでに私も救出して欲しいかなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, and I’d like you to rescue me as well, if possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな無茶は駄目だ、誰か他の奴に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's reckless, no, have someone else...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知能試験でトップを確実に取れるのって・・私くらいよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who can surely top the intelligence test... is me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにマジックにはこれ以上無理はさせられない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, I can't push Magic any further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの子は守らないといけない子もいる、私は独り身だし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That girl has someone she must protect, but I’m single.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ、ランスとウルザのいい距離間が分かる感じで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, you get a sense of the good distance between Rance and Ulza...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアーク、翌日
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ragnalock Ark, the next day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子とマジックがウルザが出て行った事を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko and Magic learn that Ulza has left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無茶をすると怒るが、もうしかたないが無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They get angry if he does something reckless, but it can’t be helped now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、ハニー達もいるし、いくら魔物大将軍の場所が分かっても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But since Honey and her forces are also there, even if we know the Great Monster General's location...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

understands,"},{"lineNumber":252432,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハニーの趣味と考えと魔物がしてきた事が相反する事を）","translatedEnglishLine":"that Honey’s tastes and what the monsters have done are contradictory.)"},{"lineNumber":252433,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物軍だけでも大変なのに、さらにハニーまで・・もうお手上げだ","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster army alone is tough enough, and now Honey too... I'm at my wit's end."},{"lineNumber":252434,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザ、ハニーに関しては私に任せて下さい、少しツテがありますので","translatedEnglishLine":"Ulza, leave Honey to me; I have some connections."},{"lineNumber":252435,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとかツォトンを倒す事が出来れば・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"If we can somehow defeat Tzoton..."},{"lineNumber":252436,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが任せろ、今日はうまくいかなかったが、明日は必ず倒してやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Leave it to me, Rance said; today didn’t go well, but tomorrow I’ll definitely take him down."},{"lineNumber":252437,"originalJapaneseLine":"その夜、ランスの部屋にウルザが現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"That night, Ulza appeared in Rance’s room."},{"lineNumber":252438,"originalJapaneseLine":"おっ夜這いかと喜ぶが、ウルザは大切な話","translatedEnglishLine":"He was happy, thinking it was a night raid, but Ulza had an important matter to discuss."},{"lineNumber":252439,"originalJapaneseLine":"作戦がある協力して欲しい","translatedEnglishLine":"I have a plan and want your cooperation."},{"lineNumber":252440,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーの事か、敵についたハニーどもだな、みな殺しにするか","translatedEnglishLine":"About Honey? Those Honeys who sided with the enemy, should we kill them all?"},{"lineNumber":252441,"originalJapaneseLine":"いえ、そちらは私の方でたぶんなんとか出来ます","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I can probably handle that side myself."},{"lineNumber":252442,"originalJapaneseLine":"それより、魔軍本体の事です","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, it’s about the main force of the monster army."},{"lineNumber":252443,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":252444,"originalJapaneseLine":"私が得た情報によると","translatedEnglishLine":"According to the information I have obtained,"},{"lineNumber":252445,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスを占領している魔軍は、占領地で人民のより分けをしている模様です","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster army occupying Zess appears to be sorting the people in the occupied areas."},{"lineNumber":252446,"originalJapaneseLine":"学者、医者、先生、魔法技術者、優秀な者を選抜し奥地へ移動している","translatedEnglishLine":"They select scholars, doctors, teachers, magic technicians, and other outstanding individuals and move them to the interior."},{"lineNumber":252447,"originalJapaneseLine":"さらに、試験をしてより優秀な者はツォトンの元に送られているとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Furthermore, those who pass tests with high marks are said to be sent to Tzoton."},{"lineNumber":252448,"originalJapaneseLine":"たぶん、魔物将軍等の中に入れる素材にされているのと思われる","translatedEnglishLine":"It is probably to be used as material for becoming monster generals and such."},{"lineNumber":252449,"originalJapaneseLine":"なるほど、２重選抜をしているのか","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, they are doing a two-stage selection."},{"lineNumber":252450,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺も総統として魔軍を撃退した後は世界中から美女をどう集めるか","translatedEnglishLine":"After I, as the Supreme Leader, repel the monster army, I was thinking about how to gather beautiful women from all over the world."},{"lineNumber":252451,"originalJapaneseLine":"大変だなぁと思っていたが、その方法はいいな","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought it would be difficult, but that method is good."},{"lineNumber":252452,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは・・ともかく、話を戻します","translatedEnglishLine":"That aside... let me get back to the matter at hand."},{"lineNumber":252453,"originalJapaneseLine":"私が捕まっている捕虜に紛れて魔軍が行っているその知能試験を受ける","translatedEnglishLine":"I will take the intelligence test the monster army conducts, disguised as a prisoner held captive."},{"lineNumber":252454,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分で言うのもなんだけど、たぶん優秀な者として選ばれると思うわ","translatedEnglishLine":"I hate to say it myself, but I think I’ll be chosen as one of the outstanding."},{"lineNumber":252455,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ここうぬぼれキャラに見られないようにうまく表現して）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Express this so she doesn't seem conceited.)"},{"lineNumber":252456,"originalJapaneseLine":"特に優秀な者は魔物大将軍ツォトンの元に送られるというから、","translatedEnglishLine":"They say especially outstanding individuals are sent to the Great Monster General communicator."},{"lineNumber":252458,"originalJapaneseLine":"これはＧＰＳ内蔵で現在地を発信するの、数字の羅列でしかないけど","translatedEnglishLine":"It has a built-in GPS and sends the current location, though it's just a string place."},{"lineNumber":252460,"originalJapaneseLine":"これで魔物大将軍ツォトンの居場所が分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"With this, we will know the location of the Great Monster General Tzoton."},{"lineNumber":252461,"originalJapaneseLine":"後はランス君は魔人討伐隊を率いて攻撃して欲しい","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, Rance-kun, I want you to lead the demon extermination squad and possible."},{"lineNumber":252463,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな無茶は駄目だ、誰か他の奴に・・","translatedEnglishLine":"That's reckless, no, have someone else..."},{"lineNumber":252464,"originalJapaneseLine":"知能試験でトップを確実に取れるのって・・私くらいよ、","translatedEnglishLine":"The one who can surely top the intelligence test... is me."},{"lineNumber":252465,"originalJapaneseLine":"それにマジックにはこれ以上無理はさせられない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, I can't push Magic any single."},{"lineNumber":252467,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここ、ランスとウルザのいい距離間が分かる感じで・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, you get a sense of the good distance between Rance and Ulza..."},{"lineNumber":252468,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラグナロックアーク、翌日","translatedEnglishLine":"Ragnalock Ark, the next day."},{"lineNumber":252469,"originalJapaneseLine":"千鶴子とマジックがウルザが出て行った事を知る","translatedEnglishLine":"Chizuruko and Magic learn that Ulza has left."},{"lineNumber":252470,"originalJapaneseLine":"無茶をすると怒るが、もうしかたないが無い","translatedEnglishLine":"They get angry if he does something reckless, but it can’t be helped now."},{"lineNumber":252471,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、ハニー達もいるし、いくら魔物大将軍の場所が分かっても","translatedEnglishLine":"But since Honey and her forces are also there, even if we know the Great Monster General's location..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく見ると魔物隊長
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking closely, it's the monster captain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、ここって・・もしかして、魔軍の野営地では・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, this place... could it be the monster army's campsite?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、やった・・夜戦だ、夜戦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, we did it... a night battle, a night battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ものども、かかれー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone, attack!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長が・・ぐはっ・・と倒れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain... *ugh* collapsed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ・・これじゃない、俺が倒したいのは魔物大将軍ツォトンだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... this isn't it. The one I want to defeat is the Great Monster General Tzoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしくは妥協しても魔物将軍だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or if I settle, then at least the Monster General.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな雑魚隊長ではない、くそっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not some weak little captain like this, damn it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵が集まってきていますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy is gathering.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたない、もう戻るぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can't be helped, let's retreat now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都ラグナロックアーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Capital Ragnalock Ark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に成果も無くランスが戻って来ていた（過去形）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance had returned without any particular success (past tense).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボス狙いの奇襲もいつもうまくいくとは限らないか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A surprise attack targeting the boss doesn't always work out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うんよく魔物将軍クラス、また魔物大将軍と遭遇出来る確率なんて低いですからね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, the chance of encountering a monster general class or even a great monster general is really low.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、俺様は英雄なのに・・・むだ足ふませやがって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, even though I'm a hero... made me waste my steps.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新しい情報が入る、中立を保っていたハニーキング率いる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: New information has arrived: the Honey King, who had remained neutral,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー軍団が魔物側についた模様です、その数１０万ほどかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honey army has apparently sided with the monsters, numbering around 100,000.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは有り得ないとウルザが驚く・・いや、かれらの事だから・・考える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ulza was surprised and said that's impossible... but then thought 'well, it is them...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （意味深でいいです　ウルザは分かっています、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (This is good for a meaningful hint: Ulza understands,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーの趣味と考えと魔物がしてきた事が相反する事を）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that Honey’s tastes and what the monsters have done are contradictory.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍だけでも大変なのに、さらにハニーまで・・もうお手上げだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster army alone is tough enough, and now Honey too... I'm at my wit's end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザ、ハニーに関しては私に任せて下さい、少しツテがありますので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ulza, leave Honey to me; I have some connections.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかツォトンを倒す事が出来れば・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we can somehow defeat Tzoton...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが任せろ、今日はうまくいかなかったが、明日は必ず倒してやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leave it to me, Rance said; today didn’t go well, but tomorrow I’ll definitely take him down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その夜、ランスの部屋にウルザが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That night, Ulza appeared in Rance’s room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっ夜這いかと喜ぶが、ウルザは大切な話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was happy, thinking it was a night raid, but Ulza had an important matter to discuss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦がある協力して欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have a plan and want your cooperation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーの事か、敵についたハニーどもだな、みな殺しにするか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About Honey? Those Honeys who sided with the enemy, should we kill them all?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、そちらは私の方でたぶんなんとか出来ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I can probably handle that side myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより、魔軍本体の事です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, it’s about the main force of the monster army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が得た情報によると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: According to the information I have obtained,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスを占領している魔軍は、占領地で人民のより分けをしている模様です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster army occupying Zess appears to be sorting the people in the occupied areas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学者、医者、先生、魔法技術者、優秀な者を選抜し奥地へ移動している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They select scholars, doctors, teachers, magic technicians, and other outstanding individuals and move them to the interior.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに、試験をしてより優秀な者はツォトンの元に送られているとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furthermore, those who pass tests with high marks are said to be sent to Tzoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん、魔物将軍等の中に入れる素材にされているのと思われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is probably to be used as material for becoming monster generals and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、２重選抜をしているのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, they are doing a two-stage selection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺も総統として魔軍を撃退した後は世界中から美女をどう集めるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After I, as the Supreme Leader, repel the monster army, I was thinking about how to gather beautiful women from all over the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大変だなぁと思っていたが、その方法はいいな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it would be difficult, but that method is good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは・・ともかく、話を戻します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That aside... let me get back to the matter at hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が捕まっている捕虜に紛れて魔軍が行っているその知能試験を受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will take the intelligence test the monster army conducts, disguised as a prisoner held captive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分で言うのもなんだけど、たぶん優秀な者として選ばれると思うわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hate to say it myself, but I think I’ll be chosen as one of the outstanding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ここうぬぼれキャラに見られないようにうまく表現して）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Express this so she doesn't seem conceited.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に優秀な者は魔物大将軍ツォトンの元に送られるというから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say especially outstanding individuals are sent to the Great Monster General Tzoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私がこっそり、この魔法通信機を押す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will secretly press this magic communicator.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはＧＰＳ内蔵で現在地を発信するの、数字の羅列でしかないけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It has a built-in GPS and sends the current location, though it's just a string of numbers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子なら場所を見つけてくれるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko will find the place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで魔物大将軍ツォトンの居場所が分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this, we will know the location of the Great Monster General Tzoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後はランス君は魔人討伐隊を率いて攻撃して欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, Rance-kun, I want you to lead the demon extermination squad and attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、ついでに私も救出して欲しいかなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, and I’d like you to rescue me as well, if possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな無茶は駄目だ、誰か他の奴に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's reckless, no, have someone else...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知能試験でトップを確実に取れるのって・・私くらいよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who can surely top the intelligence test... is me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにマジックにはこれ以上無理はさせられない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, I can't push Magic any further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの子は守らないといけない子もいる、私は独り身だし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That girl has someone she must protect, but I’m single.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ、ランスとウルザのいい距離間が分かる感じで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, you get a sense of the good distance between Rance and Ulza...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアーク、翌日
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ragnalock Ark, the next day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子とマジックがウルザが出て行った事を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko and Magic learn that Ulza has left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無茶をすると怒るが、もうしかたないが無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They get angry if he does something reckless, but it can’t be helped now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、ハニー達もいるし、いくら魔物大将軍の場所が分かっても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But since Honey and her forces are also there, even if we know the Great Monster General's location...
